patthana15.37:1.1_0: Nosaññojanaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
patthana15.37:1.1_1: …pe… noganthaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
patthana15.37:1.1_2: …pe… nooghaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noogho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
patthana15.37:1.1_3: …pe… noyogaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noyogo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
patthana15.37:1.1_4: …pe… nonīvaraṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
patthana15.37:1.1_5: …pe… noparāmāsaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noparāmāso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
